name: Super Cars
overview:
The roar of the engines and high powered machinery fills your ears as you lean back in your slick Nissan GTO 300ZX Turbo. It's you against the best drivers in the world in a race for money, glory and the supreme championship.

Buy extras at the garage such as turbo chargers, missiles and retro brakes to soup up your car and give you an edge over your competitors. Weave or blast your way through your opponents and wind your way past oil slicks and dirt piles to reach the finish line.

So if you think you've got the guts to handle the speed and competition of a pro race track, take a spin in the fastest game of the century, SUPER CARS.
